rev.comment: Reverted [[WP:AGF|good faith]] edits by [[Special:Contributions/82.76.32.159|82.76.32.159]]; No, that is not an advert. Not to mention that is a FREE service. ([[WP:TW|TW]])

'''Kubuntu''' is an official derivative of the [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] [[operating system]] using the [[KDE]] graphical environment instead of [[GNOME]]. It is part of the Ubuntu project and uses the same underlying system. It is possible to run both the KDE desktop (kubuntu-desktop) as well as the Gnome desktop (ubuntu-desktop) interchangeably on the same machine. Every package in Kubuntu shares the same repositories as Ubuntu.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kubuntu.org/faq.php |title=Kubuntu FAQ}}</ref> It is released regularly and predictably on the same schedule as Ubuntu.<ref>[https://wiki.kubuntu.org/Kubuntu Kubuntu Wiki]</ref>
+
'''Kubuntu''' is an official derivative of the [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] [[operating system]] using the [[KDE]] graphical environment instead of [[GNOME]]. It is part of the Ubuntu project and uses the same underlying system. It is possible to run both the KDE desktop (kubuntu-desktop) as well as the Gnome desktop (ubuntu-desktop) interchangeably on the same machine. Every package in Kubuntu shares the same repositories as Ubuntu.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kubuntu.org/faq.php |title=Kubuntu FAQ}}</ref> Kubuntu CDs can be ordered through the [https://shipit.kubuntu.org/ Shipit] service. It is released regularly and predictably on the same schedule as Ubuntu.<ref>[https://wiki.kubuntu.org/Kubuntu Kubuntu Wiki]</ref>
